com.pfc.android.archcomponent.repository

Class RemoteRepositoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pfc.android.archcomponent.repository.RemoteRepositoryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteRepository

    public class RemoteRepositoryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements RemoteRepository
    RemoteRepositoryImpl implements a base interface: RemoteRepository

    RemoteRepositoryImpl is the implementation class for managing the communication between the ViewModel and the Remote backend: Unified Tfl API @link{https://api.tfl.gov.uk/} using Retrofit.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ana San Juan

    • Method Detail

      • getStopLocation

        public void getStopLocation(double lat,
                            double lon,
                            int radius,
                            retrofit2.Callback<StopLocationEntity> callback)
        Method async with fourth parameters: latitude, longitude, radius and a callback in order to make a call to the API transport. In the last one is where the answer of the API is saved.

        This method return the information about the Stops near to the location given through the parameters (lat, lon and radious).

        Specified by:
        getStopLocation in interface RemoteRepository
        Parameters:
        lat - a double number giving the latitude of the location.
        lon - a double number giving the longitude of the location.
        radius - an int number giving the radius of the search.
        callback - a Callback giving the object in order to keep the reply of the API.

      • getArrivalInformation

        public void getArrivalInformation(java.lang.String naptanId,
                                  retrofit2.Callback<java.util.List<ArrivalsEntity>> callback)
        Method async with two parameter: naptanId and a callback in order to make a call to the API transport. The last one is where the reply of the API is saved.

        This method return all the arrival information from the lines related with on Stop in this moment. given through one parameters (naptanId).

        Specified by:
        getArrivalInformation in interface RemoteRepository
        Parameters:
        naptanId - a String giving to identify the Stop that we are interesting on.
        callback - a Callback giving the object in order to keep the answer of the API.

      • getPredictionsByStopPLine

        public void getPredictionsByStopPLine(java.lang.String lineId,
                                      java.lang.String naptanId,
                                      java.lang.String direction,
                                      retrofit2.Callback<java.util.List<ArrivalsEntity>> callback)
        Method async with fourth parameters: lineId, naptanId, direction and a callback in order to make a call to the API transport. In the last one is where the reply of the API is saved.

        This method return the arrival information for one line, in one stop and with one direction given through the parameters (lineId, naptanId and direction).

        Specified by:
        getPredictionsByStopPLine in interface RemoteRepository
        Parameters:
        lineId - a String giving to identify the Line that we are interesting on.
        naptanId - a String giving to identify the Stop that we are interesting on.
        direction - a String that identify the direction of the bus. The value coud be "inbound", outbound" or "all".
        callback - a Callback giving the object in order to keep the answer of the API
